_sText:
Introduction
--------------
Ive seen and i make a lots of movies and there are a lots of frags called "spraydowns".
In these frags you use an M4, AK or MP5 an kill 3 to 7 men with one magazine.
So it inspired me and i made this map!

The Map
-----------
2 Rooms, 16 spawns per team, more to say?
Yes i think so.
There are only to rooms. There are connected with an long room. The map is the littlest ive ever made. Its very good to make aces and spraydowns in this map.
Buyzones are available.
Look at the screen's to see the map in its full bright ;).

The Credits and Special thanks (boring ^_^...)
----------------------------------------------
I used the standart Valve textures and the standart Valve Windows model.
If you have any suggestions or do you know what i can do better in this map? Write it down here and it do it immedialy! More comments, more versions! So:

HAVE FUN WITH THIS MAP!
=======================

ACTUAL VERSION: 1.0
